column5: Im looking for info or reveiws about temperature/speed gauges that salmon fisherman use (they tell you the temp and speed at your lure).  Ones that are located right on the downrigger cable, or ones you send down manually.  Does anyone use them, good or bad, or any recommendations.  Any help would be appreciated.  Thanks
Fish Hawk temperature prob.....heres a link to this years model ...mine is older but i use it every time ...  http://www.gloutdoorstore.com/fishhawkprobe.aspx
Fish Hawk X4, Moore Subtroll or the Depth Raider (in that order)  Current makes a huge difference in trolling and it will definitely increase your hook up ratio...
